title: Type I Fibers: The Endurance Engine
description: A fast breakdown of Type I Fibers: The Endurance Engine for builders.

hook.text: Some muscle fibers can work for hours without complaint. They're small, slow, and nearly tireless.

buildup.text: Type I fibers are packed with mitochondria and capillaries. They burn fat and oxygen for steady energy.

twist.text: They produce less force than fast-twitch fibers. You can't sprint or lift heavy on slow-twitch alone.

punchline.text: Type I fibers won't win a sprint, but they'll outlast everything.
